name: Cyber War - Fight To The Last Man
name_original: Cyber War - Fight To The Last Man
description:
An early alpha CyberWar release is already available for download - you can try the game for yourself and fight as a team against your opponent on our test server.  Name of the game will be confirmed right before the release. As for now “CyberWar” is a temporary name. Please be aware that much of this is in a raw stage and doesn't fully represent the final quality. 

If you feel like playing, please give it a run, leave your feedback and thoughts - this will make me very happy. 

Any feedback will be helpful in production and refining the game. 

It’s a multiplayer online game, playable on PC. The focus is on player vs. player gameplay with each player controlling a battle hovercraft. The objective is to destroy enemy troops and complete the mission either by destroying all hover vessels of the opposing team or capturing the enemy team's base. The player takes control of a single hovercraft of their choice, and enters the battle on a random level. The player has control over the hover (vessel) movement, firing, and can communicate with allied players through the chat. The goal is to survive and keep the human race from extinction, breaching into the heart of the enemy defense.

• Platform: PC
• Genre: Action Game, Shooter
• Multiplayer: multiplayer online game
• Camera View: Third Person

Discord Website Youtube

CyberWar server located in Google Cloud Datacenter in Finland. Open for registration 24 hours a day.

Now it is time we take the next step. I've decided to launch a test server for those who want to play. Feel free to report errors and issues you find - I will correct them all over time. The Primary goal is to find funding and people who will believe in the future of CyberWar and want to help it become better and better. I hope you like my idea and enjoy the game. If you have time to play, please give it a run, leave your feedback and thoughts - this will make me very happy. Remember that this is only alpha version of the game all graphics and game play logic will improve over time. Let's Go to Battle...
